name: DAFTY JOYS
description:
Our world is surrounded by a lot of urban legends. Some may be believable, others not, but how we deal with them is entirely our own decision. As time consuming as they might be, we should never look at them as our only life's purpose. Everyone has their own ideals, now it's your time to deal with some of them.

Controls:

  • Movement – arrows, WASD
  • Interact – E
  • Close the windows – ESC

Created by:

Coding: Jan Jaroš, Tomáš Selmeci

Graphics: Ľubica Rondošová, Tomáš Matějka
